channel.title: How do i make a npc say if im online or offline
channel.description: will some one tell me what to put in npchandler for a npc sayng if im online when im online and offline when im offline

item.title: How do i make a npc say if im online or offline
item.dc:creator: @axl axl
item.description:
@axl wrote:

ok so now first search npchandler

search for

moo

then you shoud see

					[code]if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";
					}[/code]

ok now you need to press enter after the last } and add this

if (npcs[i].npcType == THE NPC YOU WANT) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("youre name")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "youre name is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "youre name is OFFLINE"; } } }

ok change to youre name to youre ingame name ,
now also change the npc id

Read full topic
